data.title: 2024 calendar of main global events on the road to the Olympic Games
data.meta_description: Before the world's best athletes are reunited at the Olympic Games Paris 2024, global competitions provide the teaser ahead of the biggest sporting showcase this year. Get to know all the World Championships and global Olympic qualifying tournaments taking place in 2024 ahead of the Games.
data.text:
The Olympic Games Paris 2024 are happening this year!

Taking place from 26 July to 11 August, more than 10,000 of the best athletes in the world will gather in the French capital for the four-yearly festival of sport.

But you don't have to wait until the Olympic Games to follow your favorite athletes.

All around the world, dozens of global events will offer world titles and Olympic quota spots during the six first months of 2024, giving sports enthusiasts a taste of what's to come at the XXXIII Olympiad.

Olympics.com has therefore collated the main global sport events, some of which are crucial in the qualification process to Paris 2024, so you don't miss out on the pre-Games drama.

In this article, 'direct quotas' are the berths obtained by a National Olympic Committee (NOC) or under the name of an athlete in certain sports. NOCs have the exclusive authority for the representation of their respective countries at the Olympic Games, as athletes' participation at the Paris Games depends on their NOC selecting them to represent their delegation at Paris 2024.

Also taken into account are the competitions that give athletes points toward their Olympic rankings, and the ones in which the Olympic standards are crucial in the qualification process, including athletics and swimming.
